title: Spring onion, potato and cheese fritters with quick pickled beetroot
description: Transform leftover boiled potatoes and fridge-drawer veggies into a colourful and lightly spiced treat with this simple recipe.
ingredients: 1 beetroot, peeled and cut into long, thin matchsticks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
100g/3½oz leftover baked, boiled or raw potatoes, such as King Edward or Maris Piper, grated
50g hard cheese, such as parmesan, finely grated
